title: Fulfill Everything!
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Phew, Maru needs a little break zura~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Me too....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Aaah, no, you can’t! Don’t move, Hanamaru-chan, Setsuna-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Hieeeh, Kotori-san is so strict zura....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I think Kotori-san’s personality changes a little bit whenever it’s about costumes....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>It’s important for me to get a mental image of everyone’s costumes so I can make one that fits them perfectly! That’s why I need your help! Please!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>O-, okay! Maru can’t say no to that look zura.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I feel like I want to fulfill your every request.... Kotori-san, what pose should we do next!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu, thanks, you two♡ Then, next up, I’d like you to try sitting with backs against each other♡<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Got it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Got it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
